recordings.response:
[Player]: Sister Martha, how are you feeling?
[NPC]: Brother, the Lord tests us with affliction. I am... managing. Your kindness in asking means more than you know.

[Player]: I notice tension in the town, Sister. The shutters drawn tight, the silence at midday.
[NPC]: You've eyes to see, Brother. The Steward's word weighs heavy on us all. He declared my illness a judgment.
[DISCOVERY: fact-steward-decree|sin-injustice|The Steward has been making harsh decrees that deny care to the sick]

[Player]: How fares your family, Brother Thomas?
[NPC]: We endure, Brother. But Sister Martha... she needs medicine the Steward won't provide. I do what I can.

[Player]: I noticed your boots are muddy at odd hours, Brother. The store is a long walk from the homestead.
[NPC]: You... you're observant, Brother. I won't deny it. Martha needs those herbs. I take them because no one will sell to her.
[DISCOVERY: fact-thomas-theft|sin-theft|Brother Thomas steals medicine for Martha from the store at night]

[Player]: Steward. I come bearing the authority of the Faith.
[NPC]: Welcome, Brother. Bridal Falls walks the path of righteousness under my guidance. You will find all is in order here.

[Player]: Steward, I come with the authority of the Faith. Tell me of this town's spiritual state.
[NPC]: Brother, you're welcome here. Our town walks the path of righteousness, as I guide them. My word is doctrine here.
[DISCOVERY: fact-steward-pride|sin-pride|The Steward believes only he knows God's will for Bridal Falls]

[Player]: Sheriff. I need to understand what's happening here.
[NPC]: You Dogs ride in thinking you own the place. Talk to the Steward. He keeps the peace. I enforce it.

[Player]: I didn't ride all this way for evasions, Sheriff. Out with it.
[NPC]: You push too hard, Brother. This is my town to keep order in. I answer to the Steward, not to wandering Dogs.
[DEFLECTED]

[Player]: Peace be with you, Sister. How are the children?
[NPC]: They feel what their parents hide, Brother. Fear runs through this town like creek water. Three fell ill last week.

[Player]: You observe much from the schoolhouse, Sister Ruth. What have you seen?
[NPC]: One might notice that Thomas walks to the store at night. That the Sheriff watches but does nothing. That the sickness follows a pattern.
[DISCOVERY: fact-ruth-pattern|sin-sickness|The sickness spreads to those who question the Steward's decree]
